original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1121)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1121)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對目標範圍內敵方造成物理傷害且讓敵方武將產生 <color=#ccffcc>7</color> 秒暈眩，同時 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 秒為間隔以  <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(896)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>隨機對敵方武將周圍造成 <color=#ccffcc>6</color> 次物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1121)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1121)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> Inflicts physical damage to the enemy within the target range and causes the enemy generals to stun in <color=#ccffcc>7</color> seconds, and at the same time <color=#ccffcc>4</color> Seconds are the interval <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(896)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> Randomly attack the surrounding enemy generals<color=#ccffcc>6</color> Physical damage.
